data.title: Mens Football
data.text:
Welcome to the 2024 season at North Wellington Football.

Get ready for an exciting season starting at the end of April with North Wellington Football Club!

Whether you're a new team or an individual player looking to join, we warmly welcome you to our community. For new teams, we'll work closely with Capital Football to ensure a smooth entry into the league, negotiating the best possible level for your team, please contact either Rachel Woodhall at programmes@northwellingtonfootball.com

Individual players will find our informal matching process helpful, aligning your skills and social goals with suitable teams. If we gather enough players, we're even open to forming new divisions.

Our base is at Alex Moore Park, boasting one artificial turf and two grass pitches. After the game, head to Waiora Hub for a quality post-match environment.

Training takes place at various grounds across the region, depending on pitch availability. And don't worry about your gear – all players receive playing tops and shorts, just bring your own socks (club socks available for purchase via Intern Football).

Here's a sneak peek into the season:

Key Dates:

Competition(s)

Start Date

Men’s Central League and Men's Capital 1

weekend of 30/03/2024

Capital 2-4, Masters, Wellington Local Leagues

weekend of 06/04/2024

Senior Men: The action kicks off at the end of April and runs until the last weekend in September. Games are scheduled on Saturdays, and you can expect senior draws from Capital Football before the season opener.

Join us for an unforgettable season of football fun and camaraderie at North Wellington Football Club!

Registrations for SENIOR members (and all adult teams) are now OPEN.

All members are required to register. This will ensure that you receive all our club communications during the season.

If you are a New Player to North Wellington and are looking for a team, please contact either Rachel Woodhall at programmes@northwellingtonfootball.com

Our fee per team of 16 players will be $5,445.00. This is $340.00 per player.

All players are required to register and MUST BE registered by Monday, 31st March.

How to register for the 2024 season?

Registering is simple:

Go to our registration page the Senior Page of North Wellington FC

Choose Senior Registrations

Complete the Registration Form.

Once you have completed your registration you will receive a confirmation email.

Refunds & Cancellations
